attributes.action: Bring Blair to Court to answer for his actions
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Now Blair has left, Should he be tried has a traitor for his many attempts to sell Britain off to Europe and for his actions in Iraq that have allowed Muslims the freedom to attack this Country. He has never had a mandate to do so

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
